Title: Passion
Writer: Brian De Palma, Natalie Carter (film "Crime d'amour"), Alain Corneau (film "Crime d'amour"), Natalie Carter (additional dialogue)
Actors: Rachel McAdams, Noomi Rapace, Karoline Herfurth, Paul Anderson
Plot: The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protégée escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.
Production: Integral Film, SBS Productions, Canal+, France 2 Cinéma, Medienboard Berlin-Brandenburg
